page.title: 19THE YEAR AT ST.AIDANS cont.
page.content: holidays we had to start thinking about St.Davids Day,we had a concert on St.Davids night and a bazaar,all the classes sang songs and did choral speaking.We recited a poem by Dylan Thomas.Easter followed very soon afterwards and so we were busy again. All of class 4 went to a Youth Hostel in Broad Haven,we went to the National Park,to see the Lifeboat Station and many moe things.After school activities include netball,soccer, rugby and rounders,in all these matches we games against other schools and we have won quite a few games.The school orchestra plays in the Amoco Festival every year. On Wednesday we are having Leavers Assembly when all the prizes are given out before we leave school.On Friday the school year ends and I will be leaving to go to Secondary School.
